LanguageData.Tatami_Green.label: 榻榻米(绿)
LanguageData.Tatami_Green.description: 稻草制成的地板材料。榻榻米可以净化空气，调节湿度。 \n榻榻米的阻燃性能也很好，所以它不会燃烧，即使发生火灾也一样。
LanguageData.Tatami_Yellow.label: 榻榻米(黄)
LanguageData.Tatami_Yellow.description: 稻草制成的地板材料。榻榻米可以净化空气，调节湿度。 \n榻榻米的阻燃性能也很好，所以它不会燃烧，即使发生火灾也一样。
LanguageData.ZP_Soil.label: Soil
LanguageData.ZP_Soil.description: (Fertility:100%)\nMake the land possible for agriculture\nSoil will be placed on sand, ice, gravel, rough stone, smooth stone.
LanguageData.ZP_SoilRich.label: Fertile Soil
LanguageData.ZP_SoilRich.description: (Fertility:140%)\nImprove agriculturally possible soil to Rich Soil.
LanguageData.ZP_Mud.label: Mud
LanguageData.ZP_Mud.description: Mud the soil for paddy fields.
LanguageData.ZP_LandfillSoil.label: Reclaimed soil
LanguageData.ZP_LandfillSoil.description: (Fertility:50)\nFill a place with poor footing.\nMud, swamp, shallow, coastal current is reclaimed.
